translation: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie, filed for divorce.
transcript: Brad Pitt， Angelina Jolie啊进入离婚。

translation: Some of my friends seemed more affected by the sudden shock than Pitt and Jolie.
transcript: 我的朋友圈啊好几个朋友啊，我感觉比他们两个人还要难受，啊，还要受打击啊。

translation: What can we expect of marriage anymore?
transcript: 我们以后还对婚姻有什么期待，啊？

translation: Can we continue to have faith in it?
transcript: 有什么期待？

translation: The reason why they broke up, as the media has revealed, is disagreement over parenting.
transcript: 他们分手的原因，啊媒体已经啊也披露出来了，啊是因为对子女的教育意见不合。

translation: God!
transcript: 天哪！

translation: If you look around you, you will find nine out of ten couples have disagreement over it.
transcript: 你们身边问一下，啊，就十有八九都不合。

translation: In my view, comparatively speaking, Shanghai men do a better job in this regard.
transcript: 啊我感觉到啊这是，上海男人在这点上啊还是比较可以的啊。

translation: The northern men are bossier at home, who sometimes bring workplace pressure home and become a "Narcissist" at home.
transcript: 北方男人在家里啊还要就是要做爷，对不对啊，这个你可能外面比较窝囊啊，家里面你要做老大的。

translation: Shanghai men disagree with their wife too.
transcript: 那上海男人呢也要争一下啊。

translation: But if they and their wife could not reach an agreement, they are usually more willing to make concessions.
transcript: 但争的相持不下的时候啊，他可能就会让老婆了啊。

translation: After all, the wife gives birth to the baby.
transcript: 毕竟人家10个月啊，这个这个这个自己这个孩子上面啊。

translation: Just step back and think from a broader perspective.
transcript: 就忍一忍就过去了嘛，对不对？

translation: Generally speaking, disagreement over parenting can be resolved by concessions made by one or both sides.
transcript: 一般来说，这种意见不合教育上面，啊，忍忍就算了啊。

translation: However, in the case of Wang Baoqiang, no man, not even Shanghai man, can tolerate the disgrace.
transcript: 那么我们知道，前不久啊，更前不久啊，王宝强同志，他的离婚啊，上海男人我想放到他的位子上，再能忍，估计忍不了啊。

translation: Therefore, on the Internet, netizens have all rallied around Wang, with topics like #WangDontCry.
transcript: 所以说网上一片都是啊宝宝不哭，啊。

translation: We see many WeChat posts of cute babies, with topics like #my baby just turned three months and a bunch of cute baby photos.
transcript: 宝宝这个词其实唉我们知道，我们朋友圈里面啊，这个宝宝什么三个月了啊，后面一堆小朋友的照片。

translation: Some girls may call themselves "baby" and make a WeChat Moment with topics like # Baby in a bad mood.
transcript: 啊也有女生，啊会说什么宝宝心情不好。

translation: God!
transcript: 天哪！

translation: One of my doctoral students,
transcript: 现在我的一个博士生啊，

translation: who is taller than me, will make a WeChat Moment with topics like #Baby stay strong or #Baby don't cry right after he was criticized for his dissertation and a group of people will “like” and “comment” on the post.
transcript: 啊个子比我还高啊，论文稍微批评两句啊，马上朋友圈里面宝宝不哭，宝宝要坚强，啊后面一群人点赞。

translation: It seems that our society is now so infantilized that the entire society succumbs to childlike behaviors and discourses.
transcript: 这个时代啊就进入了一个，我称之为啊男女老少整个社会都宝宝化，都变成了要受照顾的对象啊。

translation: So my argument is that Wang Baoqiang divorce incident is more than a simple celebrity divorce scandal.
transcript: 所以在我看来啊，这是我的一个论题啊，王宝强事件不只是一个明星啊这个什么婚姻离婚的八卦新闻。

translation: It signifies a societal change in our core ethical entities.
transcript: 它其实是意味着这个社会啊，一个核心的伦理实体的一个变化啊。

translation: Some of us may still remember the Peng Yu case in Nanjing that year.
transcript: 我们记得当年的南京的彭宇案啊，可能有些朋友是记得的。

translation: It was more than an individual dispute.
transcript: 这个事情绝对不只是这两个人啊这个纠纷啊。

translation: After the case,
transcript: 这个之后，啊，

translation: in the post- Peng Yu-case era,
transcript: 后彭宇时代，啊，

translation: there was a fundamental change in the ethical principles within the whole society.
transcript: 这整个社会的一个最关键的个伦理实体，有了一个根本性的变化啊。

translation: My argument today is that the Wang Baoqiang case had the same impact.
transcript: 那么我今天我的一个观点是，王宝强同样如此，啊。

translation: One of my friends, who is an entrepreneur,
transcript: 我的一个老板朋友，啊，

translation: told me that he immediately unfriended a few people suspected of becoming “Song Zhe” after this incident.
transcript: 他跟我说，啊，这个事情之后，他马上啊朋友圈里面啊，把好几个疑似宋喆的人全部拉到黑名单里去了。

translation: I think he was truly afraid.
transcript: 我想他是真的怕。

translation: Many people, for example my friend, despite their success in the society.
transcript: 很多强者啊，我的朋友是个社会强者。

translation: Can become a victim at any time, another Wang Baoqiang and the person pitied by others.
transcript: 竟然发现，啊随时可以变成受害者，随时可以变成王宝强，随时可以变成宝宝不哭里面那个宝宝，啊。

translation: This is what I call the post-Wang Baoqiang era.
transcript: 这就是我称之为后王宝强时代啊。

translation: Many of us will agree that love and trust are the two foundations of a marriage.
transcript: 我们知道啊爱情、信任是一个婚姻的两大地基啊，我相信很多朋友在这里都会同意我这个说法啊。

translation: So what happened in the post-Wang Baoqiang era?
transcript: 那么后王宝强时代发生了什么呢？

translation: Let us first talk about trust in the post-Wang Baoqiang era.
transcript: 啊  我们先来说一说，那个后王宝强时代的信任啊。

translation: Why is trust so important?
transcript: 为什么信任那么重要啊？

translation: There is no doubt trust is important.
transcript: 信任当然很重要。

translation: There is a fundamental issue concerning trust, that is, it includes risks, the risks of being betrayed.
transcript: 啊，而且信任的有一个最根本的问题，是它包含了一个风险，是被背叛的风险啊。

translation: Let us give you a simple example.
transcript: 我们举个最简单的例子啊。

translation: Suppose you are going to go on a business trip for two days
transcript: 你的出差两天啊，

translation: and ask one of your friends or neighbors to take care of your dog for you.
transcript: 这个你家里狗狗，啊你这个交给你的朋友你的邻居啊，看管两天啊。

translation: In this case, you can do nothing but trust him and will take care of your dog properly.
transcript: 你只能相信啊他是一个啊守信的人啊，他是会把你这件事做好，啊。

translation: However, what if he fails your trust?
transcript: 那么他万一坏一点呢？

translation: What if he deliberately starves your dog?
transcript: 啊这个他就故意使坏，不给你狗狗喂呢？

translation: The dog cannot complain, right?
transcript: 狗狗又不会告状的喽，对不对？

translation: Your friend may do it unintentionally, he may simply have forgotten.
transcript: 也有可能你这个朋友不使坏，他就是忘记了啊。

translation: Trust means you have no choice but to believe that he will keep his promise.
transcript: 所以信任就是包含着你只能相信，他对你会做这件事情啊。

translation: In modern society,
transcript: 那么现代社会里面，

translation: law and political science provide a way to avoid such a risk of trust by signing a contract between the two parties, forming a contractual relationship.
transcript: 啊，我们研究法学、研究政治学，有一个方式可以规避一点点信任的这样一个危机，啊，这样一个风险，那就是啊我跟我朋友签立个契约，啊形成个契约关系。

translation: If one side breaks the promise, there will be a legal consequence.
transcript: 那你可以不信任他，啊，你可以有一个法律效应。

translation: However, apparently it is impossible to use a contract to avoid risks in every situation.
transcript: 但是啊我们想想看，生活中任何事情，你可不可能都用契约的方式去完成。

translation: The society cannot function without trust.
transcript: 这个社会没有信任没法运转。

translation: The cost of cooperation become unreasonably high.
transcript: 合作成本，想想看，将会变得根本你没有办法去承受。

translation: Imagine a wife has to check all the phone records, QQ and WeChat messages, bank and Alipay transfer records of her husband every day,
transcript: 啊你想想看，诶即使有些女孩子，对吧，你每天让你去对你老公的整个手机，啊你去把所有的啊这个这个QQ、啊微信，所有对话，银行、支付宝转入转出都看一遍，

translation: this kind of life is unthinkable.
transcript: 这个生活你没法过。

translation: Therefore, the most fundamental role of trust is to help you remove the burden of constant checking up the others.
transcript: 所以信任最根本的作用就是帮你移除啊，我们叫constantly checking up the others，啊不断去检查对方的这样一个负担啊。

translation: Fukuyama, one of my favorite scholars,
transcript: 我比较喜欢的有一个学者啊叫福山，

translation: said that China is a low trust society.
transcript: 他有一个观点，他说中国啊是一个low trust society啊，是一个低信任社会啊。

translation: A key sign of a low-trust society is that people trust only their family members, the immediate family members.
transcript: 低信任社会有一个关键的标志，就是只信任家庭成员，你的直系亲属啊。

translation: More than 70% of the privately-owned companies are family-owned companies.
transcript: 你看看我们70%以上的我们的私人企业都是家族企业啊。

translation: With the wife or mother of the owner as the finance manager.
transcript: 最好自己的老婆啊或者老妈来管公司的财务啊。

translation: We do not trust others.
transcript: 就不相信别人呢，对不对？

translation: The same goes with the owner of larger companies, for example Wang Jianlin.
transcript: 不说这种小公司，你说王王健林啊。

translation: He also wishes to hand over the company to his son, Wang Sicong.
transcript: 也希望自己的啊这个公司交给王思聪啊。

translation: We do not know whether he will have his wish come true yet, but it is a clear that this is a family-managed company.
transcript: 交不交得成还不知道啊，也是这样一个家族模式。

translation: Which shows little trust for outsiders.
transcript: 啊不信任别人。

translation: Fukuyama is very worried about such a mode.
transcript: 那么福山对这个模式其实是很担忧的啊很担忧。

translation: As an old saying goes,
transcript: 啊我们古人就说过啊，

translation: wealth does not last beyond three generations.
transcript: 富不过三代。

translation: Why?
transcript: 为什么？

translation: If you use only family members.
transcript: 如果你只运用家庭成员。

translation: You will not be able to introduce other talents into your company.
transcript: 你就没法引入别的精英帮你一起来发展。

translation: This is why wealth does not last beyond three generations
transcript: 富肯定不超过三代。

translation: After the Wang Baoqiang divorce scandal, the situation has worsened.
transcript: 但是我称之为王宝强之后，我们发生了更糟糕的一个逆转。

translation: I call it from low trust to no-trust.
transcript: 我称之为叫From low trust to no-trust，从低信任到无信任。

translation: Our trust towards the nuclear family members is ruined.
transcript: 你的核子家庭啪嗒爆掉。

translation: Besides the Wang Baoqiang incident, there was another similar case, the cheating scandal of Zhang Jizhong' wife.
transcript: 那个王宝强，后面又出来一个啊张纪中啊，一样的啊。

translation: Both Wang Baoqiang and Zhang Jizhong have their own companies and both of their wives were placed in the most critical position because they do not trust outsiders.
transcript: 这两个人都是自己有公司啊，都是自己的太太安放到最关键的位子上，啊不信任别人。

translation: But satirically, the biggest hit came from the inside, from those who were most close to them.
transcript: 最后这把刀插得最深的，啊也就也就是来自身边啊。

translation: So the first question is in the post- Wang Baoqiang-divorce era, do you still have the courage to enter marriage?
transcript: 所以说第一个后第一个问题就是，后王宝强时代你还敢不敢真的再进入这个婚姻？

translation: Do you still have the courage to trust your spouse who sleeps next to you?
transcript: 你还敢不敢再信任睡在你旁边的那个枕边人啊？

translation: This is the question for us.
transcript: 这是要问自己的。

translation: Similarly, do you still have the courage to fall in love again?
transcript: 同样的，啊，你还敢不敢再去爱啊？

translation: Are you still willing to love again?
transcript: 敢不敢把你的爱再拿出来？

translation: From a psychoanalysis perspective.
transcript: 我们从精神分析啊。

translation: Let us first analyze what is love and what is not.
transcript: 从这个角度来看看啊，我们首先可以分疏一下爱情和非爱情啊。

translation: In fact,
transcript: 其实,

translation: in many intimate relationships,
transcript: 我们生活中我们很多亲密关系里面，

translation: we mistake many other things as love.
transcript: 我们把很多别的东西都当作了爱情啊。

translation: A female friend of mine, who is a celebrity in Shanghai.
transcript: 我有一个朋友，啊，一个她她她是一个上海滩名人啊。

translation: Had many failed intimate relationships and was wounded time after time.
transcript: 这个女生，啊谈过很多朋友，很多段失败的痛苦啊，很多伤口啊。

translation: However, she told me that she still believes in love.
transcript: 但是,她跟我说，她仍然相信爱情。

translation: She said she does not care whether the other party owns a car, a property, or has a deposit.
transcript: 她说我可以啊完全不管对方啊有没有车，有没有房，啊或者说有没有存款。

translation: All she cared is how she feels towards him, whether she has a crush for him.
transcript: 我只在乎我跟他见到的时候有没有心跳，我有没有感觉啊。

translation: This thinking is pure, right?
transcript: 这个很纯粹啊，对不对？

translation: However, is this love?
transcript: 那么这个是不是爱情呢，啊？

translation: We need to ask this question first.
transcript: 我们要问问这个问题：

translation: Why do we have a crush for someone?
transcript: 为什么我们会心跳？

translation: In psychoanalysis, there is a term called fantasy.
transcript: 那精神分析啊有一个术语啊叫fantasy，啊叫幻想。

translation: What does it mean?
transcript: 什么意思呢？

translation: It means that we have a preconceived notion of an ideal partner in our mind, or a fantasy scene.
transcript: 其实你们每个人在遇到这个对象之前，你们的脑子里面已经有了一个关于理想伴侣的这样一个画面啊，或者叫幻想场景。

translation: This fantasy scene may be shaped by the culture we live in.
transcript: 啊这个场景可能会形成，就是你周遭的啊以前你的那个文化，啊比方说我们那个时代。

translation: Nowadays, a prince charming may look like a South Korea celebrity with single eyelid or a young character with a high nose from a Hollywood movie.
transcript: 啊什么那个啊这个骑着白马的王子啊，现在可能是这种单眼皮的啊韩国欧巴，啊，或者那个好莱坞这个啊高鼻梁的啊那个小生啊。

translation: Or a mature and consider mid-aged man, like Wu Xiubo, who happens to share my sur name.
transcript: 或者那个更加是什么那个沧桑一点的啊暖男大叔，啊像吴秀波，啊我的本家。

translation: This is quite interesting.
transcript: 哎这个其实很有意思。

translation: With this preconceived image in the mind.
transcript: 你脑子里面已经有这个形象。

translation: If we meet someone who very much resembles Wu Xiubo, we will irresistibly have a crush on him and fall in love with him.
transcript: 哎你生活中正好碰到一个跟吴秀波有那么七70%神似的一个人，突然进入你的生命里面，你当然会心跳，啊你当然很有感觉啊。

translation: In many cases, love-at-first-sight actually can be explained by fantasy.
transcript: 所以很多的心跳实际上是来自幻想。

translation: However, fake love goes nowhere.
transcript: 啊但是基于幻想的这个fake love goes nowhere。

translation: It does not last.
transcript: 走不远。

translation: Why?
transcript: 为什么？

translation: Because even Wu Xiubo is a different person from the characters that he played on screen.
transcript: 就是因为吴秀波也不是吴秀波啊，吴秀波只是他一个公共形象。

translation: What we see are scripted characters played by him.
transcript: 只是他一个戏里的一个形象。

translation: Suppose you are in a romantic relationship with Wu Xiubo himself, not a substitute who resembles him.
transcript: 哎你真的直接跟吴秀波本人好了，我们不说70%神似的人啊。

translation: Your experience of living together will soon fly in the face of his "good man" image.
transcript: 跟他本人生活在一起，啊你肯定也会这个暖男的这个幻想的框架很快迟早会被打破。

translation: You will begin to doubt whether you were blind to have chosen such a man and live with him.
transcript: 啊我我怎么跟这个人在一起啦，啊这个人完完全全，啊我瞎了我的眼睛了，我跟这个人在一起。

translation: This is why the romantic relationship of many celebrity couples do not last, ah, be it in Hollywood or in China.
transcript: 啊这也就是很多明星的啊，这个为什么生活在一起啊明星couple，啊从好莱坞到这里中国哇都玩不转啊。

translation: The question is the same.
transcript: 问题是一样的啊。

translation: It is not because they have all met a morally bad person.
transcript: 你想想看那个，啊我们说不可能都是那种道德上的坏人那样。

translation: For example, Chen He and Wen Zhang, although their wives are beautiful, this still does not stop them from cheating on their wife.
transcript: 对吧，那个啊陈赫、文章啊家里面，我们都貌比天仙的女神放在家里面那还要去出轨，啊。

translation: Why?
transcript: 我们追问一下到底是什么状况啊。

translation: In fact, a perfect lover is only perfect because of the distance between you two.
transcript: 实际上女神啊，你只能是一个远距离，她才会是女神。

translation: If you are together all the time, you see him or her with morning breath and unwashed face.
transcript: 啊你天天在旁边，早上起来啊这个牙齿也没刷，啊脸上你眼睛看还有一堆一一坨眼屎啊。

translation: You will soon find him or her not perfect anymore.
transcript: 哪里是女神，对不对？

translation: She may look like a tired woman who has past her prime.
transcript: 那就是黄脸一个婆，是不是？啊。

translation: In addition, she may be a little spoiled, not easy to live with.
transcript: 而且你的这个架子又很大，这个又不好服侍啊。

translation: This is what will happen if we mistake fantasy as love, unhappiness and heart broke.
transcript: 这个就是基于幻想的，把幻想当作爱情产生的一个痛苦结果，啊，一个不可避免的一个悲痛。

translation: What is my suggestion on how to distinguish between fantasy and true love?
transcript: 那么我建议啊如何去区分我们说啊幻想和真爱呢？

translation: My suggestion is love at the second sight.
transcript: 我的建议是，啊叫做二见钟情。

translation: Love at first sight is unreliable.
transcript: 不是一见钟情啊，这个心跳靠不住的。

translation: Fondness from familiarity cannot be considered as love at all due to the practical considerations involved.
transcript: 也不是日久生情，啊那就根本不是情啊，那很多这个实用的啊这个考量在里面。

translation: What is love at the second sight?
transcript: 什么叫二见钟情？

translation: After you have been with each other for some time.
transcript: 就是你跟一个一段时间交往以后。

translation: You will come to see many of his/her shortcomings.
transcript: 你也看到这个人的很多缺点啦。

translation: You may find it hard to bear some his shortcomings, but you still love him/her.
transcript: 有些还忍受不了，很难忍受，但是啊你看到这个人依然会心跳。

translation: This may be true love.
transcript: 这个时候可能真的就是真爱啊真爱。

translation: This is called love at the second sight.
transcript: 所以这就是二见钟情。

translation: Psychoanalysis offers another way to tell what is true love.
transcript: 还有一个精神分析教你区别啊。

translation: That is to say, if you really love someone.
transcript: 我们刚刚今天谈论真爱爱情真爱与否的方式。

translation: Your first thought at the sight of him/her is not a sexual one.
transcript: 那就是说你真正地爱这个人啊，你看到这个人。

translation: He/she does not immediately arouse your sexual desire.
transcript: 你不是马上就会有我们叫做叫做性渴望，或者说叫Sexual Desire。

translation: Love and sex, or desire, are two completely unrelated channels.
transcript: 爱情跟性啊，跟或者说跟欲望啊，它是两个完全不相关的频道啊。

translation: When one switch is turned on.
transcript: 而且最大的问题在于，一个频道开关打开的时候。

translation: The other is automatically turned off.
transcript: 另外一个频道就自动关闭。

translation: Many of the men who are here today may have the same feeling.
transcript: 我们很多男生啊，在座的，都应该啊会就是你真的爱上一个人啊。

translation: We lose heartbeat over a look, a smile, and a flipping of hair of our beloved.
transcript: 她只要就是有的时候啊回过头来啊，不要做什么，她微微啊对你一笑，啊头发一拨啊，你已经在云端上了。

translation: If a bunch of men gossip about the chest and hip size of a woman.
transcript: 啊一堆男人啊在那边说哦这个女孩，哎呀多少胸围啊多少翘臀。

translation: They have definitely not fallen in love with her.
transcript: 他们对她肯定没有爱意。

translation: I have to refer back to the friend of mine here, the celebrity in Shanghai.
transcript: 我又要回到我的那个朋友，啊那个上海滩很有名的一个女生啊。

translation: She had any failed romantic relationships but she still believed in love.
transcript: 很多失败，啊就对感情还很相信。

translation: I never told her my understanding about why so many of her relationships did not work.
transcript: 我啊没有直接跟她说，我分析下来呀，就她人。

translation: She has a great personality and attractive appearance.
transcript: 性格很好，啊相貌也不错啊。

translation: How comes she had so many failed relationships?
transcript: 怎么会一段一段的都失败？

translation: As I see it, she herself is one of the reasons, or her cultural identity in specific.
transcript: 我的分析啊就是，至少是她问题之一吧，啊也可能是她的一个文化身份。

translation: She loves to wear clothes that are rather closely fitting and would look sexy in even a suit.
transcript: 她平常穿衣服对吧就是穿得也比较比较贴身，比较贴身啊，啊就一个套装啊，非她也非常性感。

translation: She surely has the capital to dress so.
transcript: 就是确实是这个这个有有这个资本去这么穿。

translation: However.
transcript: 啊但是问题在于啊。

translation: The problem is I was there with her at several parties and have seen the looks of many men on her.
transcript: 我自己很很多几次聚会上，我亲自看到啊很多男生看她的时候的眼神啊，你的这个方式啊，到你身边。

translation: She always has many pursuers.
transcript: 她有很多男生追求，她不缺男生的。

translation: The problem is how to make the relationship last.
transcript: 但是他们是你留不留得住他们啊。

translation: Are these men she met all bad people?
transcript: 这些男生都是渣男吗?

translation: Of all the relationships, has she never met a good guy?
transcript: 那些谈过了多少个人，全部是渣男吗？

translation: Some of her previous boyfriends got married later.
transcript: 他们在你之后，也跟别的也有几个跟别的女孩结了婚了呀。

translation: But not with her.
transcript: 但这就不是你而已。

translation: So here is a piece of advice for girls, the way you dress is more important than you think.
transcript: 所以说这是一个啊，你们很多女生啊听我这句话啊，你们怎么穿着很重要啊。

translation: Not all boys are bad guys.
transcript: 因为男生不一定都是渣男。

translation: But the way you dress may determine which switch is turned on and which is automatically turned off.
transcript: 但是你让他们打开了这个开关，他们另外开关自动关闭了，

translation: This is the conflict between love and desire.
transcript: 这就是爱与欲，很麻烦的一件事情。

translation: So, what is love?
transcript: 啊那么我们什么是爱情呢啊？

translation: You may agree with me being in love means being in an unusual state.
transcript: 我感觉你们可能都会同意我，爱指向一种非常状态。

translation: The very expression "fall in love" suggests this is a state that we have no control over.
transcript: 我们叫fall in love，啊是一种fall，是一种坠落啊，是一种你自己都没法控制自己的那个状态啊。

translation: All of a sudden, you meet someone, your heart beats faster,
transcript: 你也不想，你就莫名其妙碰到了一个人，啊突然之间你就啊心不断心跳。

translation: You have no thought for tea or rice, and you are out of your mind.
transcript: 啊不就吃不下饭了，啊茶饭不思，啊这个这个魂不守舍啊，每天的正常的这种常规啊都打乱了啊。

translation: If you are a researcher like me, you may forget about your unfinished thesis completely.
transcript: 像我这种写论文的，啊论文也不想写了。

translation: In most cases, you do not act this way because you want to.
transcript: 哎就是其实有时候，甚至你也不想这样。

translation: It is as if a force controls you.
transcript: 但是就被一种力量侵入进来了。

translation: Your beloved is all over your mind.
transcript: 这个人就在脑子里面。

translation: It is impossible to focus and work.
transcript: 啊没法工作啊。

translation: On the other hand, desire is more related to our biological instinct.
transcript: 欲望呢，啊我们知道欲望是更加指向人的一个生物性的状态。

translation: One night stand is a common thing for young people in the cities.
transcript: 啊我们今天那个都市啊很多都市青年啊有很多啊one night stand啊，或者说一夜情啊。

translation: In the morning, they put on their clothes, and go back to work.
transcript: 他第二天没事啊，照样工作啊，穿好衣服啊。

translation: There is no impact on their normal life.
transcript: 就没有任何影响啊。

translation: This is desire.
transcript: 这个就是欲望啊。

translation: A completely different thing from love.
transcript: 欲望跟爱情之间的一个完全不同的东西啊。

translation: But the problem today is that more and more urban youth choose to avoid love and pursue desire.
transcript: 但是今天问题在于，今天的都市青年啊越来越多的人，躲避爱啊，追逐欲望。

translation: No one will be very envious of Wang Baoqiang, who married Ma Rong, the first girl he ever loved.
transcript: 没有人会很羡慕啊那个初恋就是马蓉的王宝强。

translation: However, many people will envy Chen Guanxi secretly even though they may still call him a bad guy.
transcript: 但很多人会羡慕那个叫陈冠希，啊可能口头上还在骂他啊怎么怎么渣啊，内心很羡慕。

translation: Why fewer and fewer people embark on the road of love?
transcript: 为什么啊这个爱情这条路没有人去走呢？

translation: Because there is price for love.
transcript: 因为有爱的代价啊。

translation: In love, we expose our vulnerabilities to each other.
transcript: 其实你想想看，在爱情里面，你把自己最脆弱的一面都拿了出来，暴露在对方面前啊。

translation: Love entails an absolute trust between each other.
transcript: 爱隐含了我称之为一个叫绝对的信任啊。

translation: We just talked about trust.
transcript: 我们刚刚讲信任。

translation: But trust does not necessarily include love.
transcript: 信任并不一定的包含爱。

translation: We can also trust our friends or family members.
transcript: 啊你可以信任你的朋友，你可以信任你的那个啊家庭成员。

translation: On the other hand, love means an absolute trust.
transcript: 但是爱，反过来一定包含绝对的信任啊。

translation: Let us think about what we are like when we are in love.
transcript: 我们想想看，你在爱中是个什么样的状况啊。

translation: When you love someone.
transcript: 在爱另外一个人的时候。

translation: You give him the absolute power to destroy you.
transcript: 你给了他绝对的摧毁你的权力。

translation: Back to the case of Wang Baoqiang, I am no fan for gossips.
transcript: 所以说我说王宝强啊，我不是很八卦的一个人。

translation: But I do think Wang Baoqiang really loved Ma Rong and had absolute trust towards her.
transcript: 我觉得王宝强可能真的很爱马蓉，他至少是对她绝对的信任。

translation: That Wang Baoqiang suffered so much is not such a pity.
transcript: 啧所以王宝强今天那么惨痛啊，实际上并不可惜啊。

translation: This is the price for love, the risk of love.
transcript: 这就是爱的代价，这就是爱的风险啊。

translation: The key question to aks is that in this post-Wang Baoqiang era.
transcript: 关键的问题是在这个后王宝强时代。

translation: Are you still willing to fall in love again?
transcript: 你还愿不愿意再去爱？

translation: Would you rather be Wang Baoqiang who had loved and got heartbroken or Edison Chen who had many girlfriends and lived a happy life?
transcript: 或者说王宝强自己还愿不愿意再做王宝强，还是做啊这个经常换女生的陈冠希啊，没有什么痛苦啊，很开心。

translation: This is a question for us to think about today.
transcript: 所以说这个就是一个我们今天要去思考的问题。

translation: As we have discussed, the first thing we mistake for love is fantasy.
transcript: 那么我们刚刚说了第一种非爱情是幻想。

translation: The second is desire.
transcript: 第二种非爱情是欲望。

translation: The third thing is even more familiar to us, material wellbeing.
transcript: 第三种非爱情，啊那你们更熟悉，啊那就是物质，啊。

translation: The talk is no more than a platitude, so familiar to most of us.
transcript: 这个是我们老生常谈了么，啊每个人很多时候至少都了解这一块。

translation: Marriage is actually about selling ourselves at a good price.
transcript: 啊婚姻实际上就可以用来把自己卖个好价钱啊。

translation: In dating, many people will indirectly enquire the other side whether he/she owns a property or has the deposit for the down payment.
transcript: 很多的啊约会的时候你看到很多人，在私下里面啊隐隐约约地婉转地去了解对方，啊这个这个有没有啊这套房子啊，或者说有没有存款啊去这个这个这个付一个这个这个这个首付，对不对？

translation: Why have dating platforms become so popular and successful?
transcript: 那么今天啊我们看那些网站的，那个网网络的那个相亲网站啊，我说他们为什么那么成功？

translation: In my view, it is because they have completely normalized what we did indirectly in the past.
transcript: 他们就把以往我们还要偷偷掩掩的事情给完全地正常化了。

translation: When we search for a match on the platform.
transcript: 啊你进入搜索的时候。

translation: We will condition the target to someone who is taller than 1.75 meters and owns a property and a car.
transcript: 是不是啊1米75以上啊，有房有车？

translation: Those who are shorter than 1.70 meters will be ruled out from the target groups.
transcript: 那么1米7的呢，直接变剩男。

translation: What about those without a property?
transcript: 啊那么没房的呢？

translation: You no longer need to ask about it indirectly in dating.
transcript: 啊你都不需要在约会的时候，还偷偷摸摸隐隐晦晦去问有没有房。

translation: The search engine will do the job for you.
transcript: 搜索引擎直接帮你干掉。

translation: Our life is a bald commercialization.
transcript: 所以说我们这个生活是一个赤裸裸的商品化。

translation: This is quite similar to shopping online.
transcript: 其实你我我比较过，这个体验很相似啊。

translation: What you do on a dating website is similar to shopping on Taobao.
transcript: 你去上相亲网站的体验，跟你上淘宝网站的体验一样的啊。

translation: There is no big difference.
transcript: 购物体验是一样的。

translation: In both cases, we first search for what we want by keywords.
transcript: 啊先是按需搜索，啊去把这个打进去啊，然后出来一堆各种各样的图片，啊一堆堆罗列出来。

translation: Then, we browse the search results one by one.
transcript: 啊然后一个个去看啊。

translation: In addition, in both cases,
transcript: 而且一样的，

translation: we choose by looking at the pictures and reading the textual introductions and we have to pay for it.
transcript: 你看完图片，看完文字介绍，下单啊买东西啊。

translation: In the case of "shopping" on a dating platform, we pay for the "stamps", the chance to meet the one we have picked.
transcript: 这边也是一样，你叫什么，购买邮票，对吧，你建立一个你花钱建立一个跟他碰头的机会啊。

translation: This is in every sense a process of selling ourselves.
transcript: 这完全就是一个把自己卖出去的过程。

translation: By registering on such a platform,
transcript: 所以你们啊去注册了，

translation: we are putting ourselves on the shelves,
transcript: 啊这个你就把自己把放上了货货架上了啊，

translation: same as other products.
transcript: 一模一样啊。

translation: This is a common practice in our time.
transcript: 所以今天你看似，啊这个好像我们这个时代啊这很泛滥。

translation: We have so many dating services, dating live shows, and dating websites.
transcript: 这个啊各种各样dating service啊相亲服务，啊这种相亲真人秀，相亲网站。

translation: But we are actually drifting farther and farther away from love.
transcript: 但实际上啊我们离爱情越来越远。

translation: Will a marriage without love and trust work?
transcript: 你没有爱和没有信任的婚姻是否可行，没有爱啊。

translation: If we look around,
transcript: 这其实你你你身边看看，

translation: we may find examples of marriages based on material needs or marriages in which two people choose to marry each other to take what he/she needs from the other party.
transcript: 也有很多真的就是基于物质的物质婚姻，或者基于各取所需的婚姻啊。

translation: Maybe one party in the relationship wants beauty and the other wants money.
transcript: 可能你不你取美美貌，我取钱财。

translation: There is a chance that such a relationship will last and will not break the way Wang Baoqiang's did.
transcript: 也可能就这么走到老了，对吧，没有像王宝强这样直接爆掉。

translation: So, I call it a personal choice.
transcript: 所以这个啊我称之为最后就是一个主体性的选择啊。

translation: You are aware of the possibility that this marriage may last or end at any time for the same reason it began.
transcript: 你知道各取所需的婚姻啊，它可能走到老，它也完全因为同样的原因而随时终结啊。

translation: For example,
transcript: 比方说,

translation: if you or your partner meet someone richer or more beautiful.
transcript: 你生命中马上出现一个比你更有啊更有钱，啊或者更年轻美貌的啊。

translation: As Ma Rong met Song Ze, who do look more handsome than Baoqiang.
transcript: 就像马蓉遇到宋喆，啊宋喆我看照片确实比这个宝宝要好看得多啊。

translation: You may become another Wang Baoqiang.
transcript: 那直接就是宝宝不哭啊。

translation: As we have discussed today, love and marriage are in systematic conflict.
transcript: 所以说这样的世界里面，我们今天一个关键就是说，爱情跟婚姻，它们结构性的就是存在对立啊。

translation: Love is an abnormal state
transcript: 爱情是一个非常状态，

translation: while marriage is a normal state.
transcript: 婚姻是一个日常状态。

translation: So how do you normalize an abnormal state?
transcript: 那怎么把非常状态常态化？

translation: It takes works,
transcript: It takes works，

translation: many extraordinary efforts.
transcript: 啊它需要很多卓绝的努力。

translation: The year before last year, there was a very good movie called Gone Girls, directed by David Finch.
transcript: 啊这个前年有一个很好看的电影叫Gone Girls，啊消失的爱人，啊David Finch导演的。

translation: There is a line in it, “you can't get lazy".
transcript: 啊他有句台词啊you can't 啊 do， you can't get lazy啊，

translation: Do not ever get lazy in marriage.
transcript: 在婚姻中你不能偷懒，

translation: Do not stop spending time and energy on it.
transcript: 你必须不断地花时间和精力啊。

translation: In this psychoanalysis, we believe, as you may agree or disagree, separation is the natural tendency.
transcript: 我那个有一个非常这个精神分析上讨论的一个话题，啊，这个你们不知道同不同意，分开啊实际上是一个自然态势。

translation: If you do not make deliberate efforts, separation is inevitable.
transcript: 你不做什么事情，就会分开。

translation: We choose to come together.
transcript: 但是在一起，啊我们说在一起在一起。

translation: This is a deliberate choice.
transcript: 但是没有人都在一起，在一起是一个人为的努力啊。

translation: It takes efforts to stay together.
transcript: 你不努力就不可能在一起啊。

translation: Alain Badiou, a contemporary French philosopher, once said, "loyalty to love makes us subjects."
transcript: 一个当代的法国哲学家Alain Badiou，啊他有一句话叫“对爱的忠诚使我们成为主体。”

translation: We do not directly become subjects.
transcript: 我们不直接成为主体啊。

translation: It is through ethics, time, and especially loyalty to love that we become so.
transcript: 我们通过伦理、时间，尤其是对爱的忠诚，才成为主体。

translation: Today we analyzed the vulnerability and risks of love in the post-Wang Baoqiang era.
transcript: 啊我们今天分析了在这个后王宝强时代。

translation: Love may lead you to something worse than what Wang Baoqiang had experienced.
transcript: 所有爱的脆弱，所有爱的风险，你可能爱会让你比王宝强更惨。

translation: However, whether to believe in love again is a personal choice, your own choice for your life.
transcript: 那么剩下的就是一个主体性的选择，就是你的生命的选择，你还愿不愿意去爱。

translation: Find the answer by yourselves.
transcript: 我把这个问题交给你们。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 感谢！
